trans-unit.source: Represents a rectangle annotation.
trans-unit.target: 表示矩形註解。

trans-unit.source: A rectangle annotation can display text inside the rectangle, in addition to being displayed as a rectangle only.
trans-unit.target: 矩形註解可以顯示在矩形中，除了正顯示為矩形只內的文字。

trans-unit.source: So you can annotate using a rectangle or a rectangle with text inside it.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以標註具有文字內文中使用矩形。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 取得註解類型。

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 註解類型。

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 不應該在內部使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used to draw the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，用於繪製註解背景。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gradient style of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> value used to draw an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> 值，用於繪製註解背景。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the gradient, a primary color that is specified the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and a secondary color that is specified with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個色彩會用來繪製指定的主要色彩漸層<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>和指定的次要色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatch style of an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景的影線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> value used to draw the background.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> 值，用於繪製背景。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the hatching, a primary color that is specified the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property, and a secondary color that is specified with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 兩個色彩用來繪製影線，指定主要色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>屬性，並使用指定的次要色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color for an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景的次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，用於繪製具有影線或漸層填滿的註解背景。

trans-unit.source: This color is used with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A>時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A>屬性使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line color of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used to draw the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，用於繪製註解行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> value used to draw the line style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> 值，用於繪製註解的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width, in pixels, of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the line width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值，表示線條寬度 (以像素為單位)。
